author: Simon Difford
description: Originally and rather boringly named "Celery Gin Cocktail" until I realised how close it is to David Embury's Nome. My original recipe (photographed) was served in a coupe glass:60 Celery gin30 Fino sherry15 Celery saccharum
name: Celery Nome

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
